keyword: how many calories are in a vape
title: How Many Calories Are in a Vape?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a vape—spoiler: zero, since it's not food. Get details on nutrition facts, myths, and related FAQs for clarity.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Vape?
assumptions: Vape refers to a standard electronic cigarette or vaping device; not edible or consumable as food. No nutritional content.
disclaimer: Vapes are not food items and contain no calories or nutrients. Values are zero; consult health experts for vaping risks, not nutrition.

quick_answer.text: A vape has 0 calories because it's an electronic device, not a food or drink.

label_note: All values are zero as vapes provide no nutritional content and mimic empty Nutrition Facts labels.

faqs.a: No, vapes have 0 calories as they are not ingested for nutrition.
Vaping itself adds no calories, but flavored e-liquids might contain trace sweeteners—still negligible and not recommended for consumption.
E-liquids are not food; any sweeteners add minimal calories, but inhaling isn't safe or caloric like eating.

faqs.q: Why search for calories in a vape?
faqs.a: Common misconception; vapes are devices, not edibles. Focus on health risks over nutrition myths.

faqs.q: Are there healthier alternatives to vaping for calories?
faqs.a: Vaping isn't about calories—consider quitting for health. For low-cal options, look to fruits or veggies, not devices.
